name: Tile Breaker (Ghosts24)
description:
Tile Breaker is a fun arcade game based on popular Microsoft's Brick Breaker but for mobile devices.

Key Directions:

Primary: Click on the 'Fire' icon to release the ball and hover/move the arrow over either left or right as required to move the paddle.

Secondary: Click the Spacebar to release the ball, Left & Right arrow keys to move the paddle.

(Note: Due to the platform's restriction, appearance may be faulty. Please review the video for the better view of the game)
